sourcesContent:
export const theme = {
  primary: '#000000', // Black text
  secondary: '#444444', // Dark gray for secondary text
  accent: '#000000', // Black accent (buttons, links)
  background: '#ffffff', // White background
  cardBackground: '#f5f5f5', // Light gray for cards
  text: '#1a1a1a', // Almost black for body text
  lightGray: '#000000', // Headings should be black in this theme
  darkGray: '#e0e0e0', // Light gray for borders
  gradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #ffffff 0%, #f5f5f5 100%)',
  shadow: '0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)',
  transition: 'all 0.25s cubic-bezier(0.645, 0.045, 0.355, 1)',
  borderRadius: '4px',
  navHeight: '100px',
  navScrollHeight: '70px',
  fontPrimary: "'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif",
  fontMono: "'Fira Code', monospace",
};
